channel.title: About deleting files
channel.description:
Hi there. I would like to know how to transfer all CGF and other files from CONFIGURES folder? I have tryeid it simple.Just removed, but RUNSERVER.BAT cannot found these(files who were at configures folder).. How to fix it? p.s. Plaese do not post about other srerver download and Configures folder backup, cause I need that the cfg files be where I need :)
Sorry for my bad English :(

item.title: About deleting files
item.dc:creator: @girvidas1995 girvidas1995
item.description:
@girvidas1995 wrote:

But I need , cause I’m trying to host my source on LINUX, but when I run server it writes :AUTOSPAWN.CFG(AND ALL OTHER FILES IN CONFIGURES FOLDER) NOT FOUND, SO I’ve had transfered all files from CONFIGURES to other folder…So I need to know how to do that tthe RUNSERVER.BAT be able to found it…

Sorry for my bad English

Read full topic

item.title: About deleting files
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

don’t move the cfg files, they’re good in the “cfg” folder.

Read full topic
